frase: It's not who I am underneath, but what I do that defines me.
The night is darkest just before the dawn. And I promise you, the dawn is coming.
Fear is what gives the rest of you strength.
Those who stand at the top determine what’s wrong and what’s right.
The only thing we're allowed to do is to believe. We can’t change anything.
People’s lives don’t end when they die, it ends when they lose faith.
Do not pray for an easy life. Pray for the strength to endure a difficult one.
Strength does not come from winning. Your struggles develop your strengths.
Pain is temporary. Quitting lasts forever.
In our society, letting others find out that you are a nice person is a very risky move.
Power comes in response to a need, not a desire.
I will surpass my limits, no matter what!
A lesson without pain is meaningless.
Sometimes the things we want most are the hardest to achieve.
A lesson is never easy, but it always teaches you something.
In life, you must take risks or you'll never know your limits.
The harder the battle, the sweeter the victory.
Every man has his breaking point. Mine just happens to be the world.
The more you sweat in practice, the less you bleed in battle.
No one can make you feel inferior without your consent.
The world isn’t perfect. But it’s there for us trying the best it can… that’s what makes it beautiful.
A lesson without pain is meaningless. You must endure to grow.
When you have exhausted all possibilities, remember this: you haven’t.
Fear is the little-death that brings total obliteration.
I am vengeance. I am the night. I am Batman!
The only limits that exist are the ones you place upon yourself.
Live as if you were to die tomorrow. Learn as if you were to live forever.
Harden yourself to the pain, and it will never break you.
People who can’t throw something important away can never hope to change anything.
It’s not about deserve, it’s about what you believe. And I believe in love.
